displayName: CIS - Ensure sticky bit is set on all world-writable directories

var.name: 7ABE8FFE-7456-4FD1-A084-859D071B5B8F
var.value: df --local -P | awk {'if (NR!=1) print $6'} | xargs -I '{}' find '{}' -xdev -type d -perm -0002 2>/dev/null | xargs chmod a+t

var.name: 7E9A3AA5-A697-4F88-8D3D-A02E27E1B5F8
var.value: df --local -P | awk {'if (NR!=1) print $6'} | xargs -I '{}' find '{}' -xdev -type d \( -perm -0002 -a ! -perm -1000 \) 2>/dev/null | wc -l
